addPage.description: Add new pages to your chatbot’s knowledge base.

props.name: chatbotId
props.description: The ID of your chatbot (can be found in the URL when viewing your bot: /bot/YOUR_BOT_ID)

props.name: urls
props.description: List of webpage URLs to add to your chatbot\

props.name: sessionCookie
props.description: Session cookie for crawling sites behind login

addTag.description: Add custom tags to a specific chatlog.

props.name: chatlogId
props.description: The ID of your chat session (can be found under Chatlog Details section, labeled as "ID")

props.name: tags
props.description: List of URLs to add to your chatbot

askQuestion.description: Sends a question to a Wonderchat bot; returns the bot’s answer.

props.name: chatbotId
props.description: The ID of your chatbot (can be found in the URL when viewing your bot: /bot/YOUR_BOT_ID)

props.name: question
props.description: The question you wish to ask your chatbot

props.name: chatlogId
props.description: The ID of your chat session (can be found under Chatlog Details section, labeled as "ID")

props.name: context
props.description: Additional custom context about the chat session (e.g., user information)

props.name: contextUrl
props.description: URL of the page the user is on to provide additional context

removeTag.description: Remove specific tags from a chatlog.

props.name: chatlogId
props.description: The ID of your chat session (can be found under Chatlog Details section, labeled as "ID")

newUserMessage.description: Triggers when a new message is sent by a user in a specific chatlog.

props.name: chatlogId
props.description: The ID of your chat session (can be found under Chatlog Details section, labeled as "ID")
